content.content: This is the discussion topic for   Ethereum Improvement Proposals   EIP-5656: Memory copying instruction An efficient EVM instruction for copying memory areas      Since external links are not allowed in EIPs:  here is the referenced analysis  and the EVM384 memory overhead discussion
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of the Ethereum Improvement Proposal EIP-5656, which proposes a new memory copying instruction for the EVM. The author provides a link to an analysis and a discussion on the memory overhead of the proposal. The post does not contain any feedback or collaboration requests.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
